text: Branislav Šoškić (19 November 1922 - 4 April 2022) was a Montenegrin politician. He was the President of the Socialist Republic of Montenegro's Presidency from 1985 to 1986. He was a member of the League of Communists of Montenegro. Šoškić was born in Gusinje, Kingdom of Serbs, Croats and Slovenes.Profile of Branislav Šoškić He was member of the European Academy of Sciences and Arts and the Montenegrin Academy of Sciences and Arts. He was its President from 1981 to 1985."Montenegro". World Statesmen. Retrieved 2011-02-06. Šoškić died on 4 April 2022 in Belgrade, Serbia at the age of 99.Preminuo akademik Branislav Šoškić ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Presidents of Montenegro
title: Branislav Šoškić
